page.title: 04Christian Churches
page.content: There are four Christian Churches on Yarm Road. They are: St. Peter's (Church of England), St. Cuthbert's (Roman Catholic), Yarm Road Methodist and the United Reformed Church. The Clergy from the four churches hold regular meetings with each other. This is to enable them all to better serve the interests of their respective congregations. Regular joint Church Services are held. These churches have considerable involvement with youth groups, such as Guides and Brownies, Scouts and Cubs and the Boys' Brigade. The Clergy also work pastorally with young and old throughout their parishes.
